# Structured Literature Review for Universal and Lighweight Cloud-Edge Orchestration 

## Required Libraries

```{r}
if(!require(kableExtra)){
    install.packages("kableExtra")
    library(kableExtra)
}
if(!require(tidyverse)){
    install.packages("tidyverse")
    library(tidyverse)
}
```


## Read the csv

```{r}
nodes <- read.csv("csv/nodes.csv")
```

## Modify values

```{r}
nodes %>% mutate_at(c("Cloud","Fog","Edge","Gateway"), funs(gsub("y","y",.,)))
```


## Show table

```{r}
kbl.nodes <- kbl(nodes)
```


## Export as LaTeX Table

```{r}
save_kable(kbl(nodes, "latex"),
           "latex/nodes.tex")
```
